Title: Limits certain regulations or orders promulgated by the superintendent
Summary: Limits certain regulations or orders promulgated by the superintendent; provides that the department of financial services shall issue a report on the effects that its suitability and best interest in life insurance and annuity transaction regulations have had on the term life insurance market.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to limiting certain regulations or orders promulgated by the superintendent; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
